answers.answer: It tastes like a flat fanta or Sunkist. Its not that bad. I would put it on the fridge as it tastes better cold. I sipped on mine for 10 mins so I wouldn't throw up.
I didn't think it was as bad as everyone made it seem. But i guess it just really depends on the person. It taste just like an orange soda but flat.
Maybe different locations have different rules but I was required to drink it before 5 minutes. The Orange is the best tasting one, not bad but sweet.
I did my test like yesterday and the stuff is wierd tasting but holding your nose helps :)
I had to drink it in 5 minutes as well.
Yes I was told I have to do it in 5min!
The fruit punch one kinda tastes like Gatorade and Koolaid thick and sweet. Its not terrible
It's really not that bad. I also had the orange and had to drink it within 5 minutes. I just chugged it to get it over with.

You actually have 5min to drink it...so if you have a week stomach then don't try to chug it. I just took my test yesterday. You are allowed to drink water but nothing else and no food. So take sips of water it helps with stomach issues and nausea.
Whats the test for sorry if it sound stupid but I'm a ftm

The orange taste pretty good actually, its just super sweet! Be prepared for a headache after you take it. What helped me was i downed a bottle of water in the bathroom before i took the drink. And while I was taking the drink the nurse told me i had to down it like a shot of liquor. So i played Shots by Lil Jon in my head and it went down. Only thing thats nasty is after taste and the headache *****, you get hyper. Good Luck!
Oh and its waaaay better tasting cold, ask for it cold
Yes cold is better. The test is to screen you to see if you have gestational diabetes

question: I have my 1 hour test tomorrow and I'm pretty nervous because I have a weak stomach and my OB told me I can't throw it up or I'll have to do it again. Ladies do y'all have any tips on how to drink it fast? I got the orange flavor does it really taste as bad as some people say
title: glucose test?
